New Records: Fakhar Zaman scored 126 runs off 81 balls for Pakistan in the match
New Zealand scored 401/6 in their innings, which is a new high for them in ODIs
Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman was named Player of the Match for his century
Rain interrupted play but Pakistan managed to reach 200/1 in 25.3 overs
Key wickets fell at crucial moments for both teams
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and elected to bat first
Fakhar Zaman was expected to play a pivotal role for Pakistan's chase
Post-Match Reflections: Fakhar Zaman's century was a standout performance
Pakistan's win boosted their confidence ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru
The umpires for the match were Paul Wilson, Richard Kettleborough, Richard Illingworth, and Joel Wilson
Others: The match was the 35th of the series
The result contributed to Pakistan's position in the series standings
